bugreport.preconditions: The website https://pro-test.qa.goit.ua/results is open in the browser
bugreport.stepstoreproduce: <1>Enter registration data</1> <2>Click the login or registration button</2> <3>Go to the (Materials) section</3> <4>Click on the (More) button in the body of the page under Useful literature</4>
bugreport.expectedresult: When you click on the (More) button in the body of the page under Useful literature, a full list opens
bugreport.actualresult: When clicking on the (More) button, the full list of useful literature does not open
